description:
Year: 2010
Country: Ukraine
Director: Holy Trinity Monastery Jonah .
Language: Russian
Genre: Documentary
Duration : Not specified
Translation: Lyubitelcky (odnogolosyj)
Russian subtitles : yes
Description:
International Festival of Orthodox movie "Cover" held in Kiev .
The first festival was held in 2003 in the Kiev -Pechersk Lavra and more like the founding congress of Orthodox directors, writers , cameramen, who have accumulated so much work and creativity that the organization of the festival looked meeting good friends - a reunion of good friends .
Festival spirit of competition and competition and not born . Each sincerely wished victory to his friend ! Even the first festival jury consisted of all participants and guests of the Film Forum . They were determined and the first winners of the first festival "Cover" .
In the intervals between screenings held a stormy discussion papers , but friendly , almost family atmosphere make the right decisions without resentment and grief. Here is the "people's jury " and the winners of the first festival "Cover" in 2003 .
The main prize was in Kiev, and its owner became director Alexander Stolyarov for a unique film " Dostoyevskaya girl." He also proposed the establishment of a special prize Sergei Losev for Best Director . Since this wonderful prize got six directors from around the world .
